name: Jade's Journey 2
description:
Plot


After realizing that having powers means having responsibilities Jade decides to live up to her role as the Chosen One, even if that means leaving her father for a while. Now, she is on a new journey, to stop Morgana and find out the truth about her plans. During her quest she will meet Sora, the previous Chosen One...
